name: Flood Of Pirates
description:
Ahoy Pirates!

Flood Of Pirates is a game made for Ludum Dare 42.

You control young pirate Jack whose boat has been attacked by other pirates.

Some of them will attack you while some of them will  try to destroy your ship.

Your goal is to survive as long as you can while battling other pirates and repairing your ship.

Be aware, game becomes hard very fast.
